name: Add new MailerLite subscribers from new Google Sheets rows
description:
This template regularly checks for new rows in Google Sheets and uses the retrieved information to create a new subscribers in MailerLite. 

The template is scheduled to run every 15 minutes. You can change the schedule after you set up the template by clicking the clock icon on the first module.

Your source spreadsheet is expected to have these columns in this order: Email, First Name, Last Name, Company. If you donâ€™t have these columns or have them in a different order, you will need to remap some of the items in the template.
